scripts.package: npm run build && rm function.zip && zip -r function.zip dist node_modules
scripts.status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-profile-mcp-dev --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-profile-mcp-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.test:local: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-event.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:tools-list: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-tools-list.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:get-profile: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-get-profile.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:venture: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-venture.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:venture-create: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-venture-create.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:vc: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-vc-initialize.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:vc-task-send: npm run build && sam local invoke AgenticProfileMCPFunction --event events/test-vc-task-send.json --template mcp-service.yaml
scripts.test:all: npm run test:local && npm run test:tools-list && npm run test:get-profile && npm run test:venture && npm run test:venture-create && npm run test:vc && npm run test:vc-task-send
scripts.foundation:up: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-foundation-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.foundation:up:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-foundation-prod --parameter-overrides Environment=prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.foundation:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-foundation-dev --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.foundation:status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-foundation-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
